name: Effron.github.io
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page

Check out some of my favorite projects:

####Asteroids
Browser playable Asteroids made using HTML Canvas. Use arrow keys to rotate ship, up to thrust, and spacebar to fire. What's your high score? (Warning: only tested on Safari and Chrome)

[https://github.com/effron/JSAsteroids/tree/after-class](https://github.com/effron/JSAsteroids/tree/after-class)

####DOMSnake
Browser playable Snake game made using JQuery.(Warning: only tested on Safari and Chrome)
[https://github.com/effron/DOMSnake](https://github.com/effron/DOMSnake)

#####TronSnake
Spinoff of DOMSnake, two player game. Snakes grow constantly, the first player to crash loses.(Warning: only tested on Safari and Chrome)
[https://github.com/effron/DOMSnake/tree/tronSnake ](https://github.com/effron/DOMSnake/tree/tronSnake )

####Jrnl
A single page journal app created with Backone.js on top of a Ruby on Rails API.
[https://github.com/effron/jrnl/tree/HarryAfterClass](https://github.com/effron/jrnl/tree/HarryAfterClass)

####Coming Soon:
Link to my App Academy capstone project!

Thanks for checking out my site! I hope you enjoyed my projects!!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
